title: 🇱🇰🏦 Trainee Bank Associate Job Vacancies – Hatton National Bank (HNB) Sri Lanka |  Sinhala | 2025
description:
🏦 Trainee Bank Associate Job Vacancies – Hatton National Bank (HNB) Sri Lanka 🇱🇰 | Apply Now!

📢 Kickstart Your Banking Career Today! Hatton National Bank (HNB) is now accepting applications for the position of Trainee Bank Associate. If you're a young and motivated individual with G.C.E. A/L qualifications, this is your opportunity to join one of Sri Lanka’s top private banks!

🔑 Job Details:
✅ Position: Trainee Bank Associate
✅ Bank: Hatton National Bank (HNB)
✅ Salary: Best in the industry 💰
✅ Age Limit: 18 – 25 years
✅ Minimum Qualification: 3 simple passes in G.C.E. A/L (any stream)
✅ Closing Date: May 14, 2025
✅ Job Type: Full-Time / Entry-Level

💼 Why Join HNB?
✔️ Join a leading private bank with a strong reputation
✔️ Attractive salary package and benefits
✔️ Structured training and career advancement opportunities
✔️ Gain professional banking experience from day one

📩 How to Apply:
Submit your application before May 14, 2025

Visit the HNB Careers Page or follow instructions in the official job post

🌐 For More Information: https://www.hnb.net/about-the-bank/careers

🚀 Apply now and begin your professional journey with HNB – one of Sri Lanka’s most trusted banks!

📢 Join the Conversation:
Connect with us on social media for more tips and updates:

🔔Face book page link :- https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100076366988755
🔔whatsapp channel link :- https://whatsapp.com/channel/0029VaCXqayHAdNSSupVc70M

👍 Don't Forget to Like, Share, and Subscribe for More Valuable Content!

title: SOLO by HNB සාක්කුවටත් ඇප් එකක්
description:
Save any card, any bank account to pay with SOLO Direct Pay Use Direct Pay for transactions on custom orders (prescriptions, restaurant orders) and pay with just a reference code provided by the vendor. Digital Account Opening Instantly open a savings account from wherever you are with the Digital Account Opening tab on SOLO. Register with a few simple steps. Use the account to transfer, pay through SOLO, and any other banking needs. SOLO Gifts Purchase gift vouchers by selecting a vendor from the list of vendors through the app and send it to anyone on their contact list. The recipient will then scan the QR code at the merchant and redeem the voucher. If the recipient is not on SOLO, they can still redeem the voucher. 60-Day Login The keep-me-logged in the feature will enable you to remain logged to the app for ease of using the app at checkout counters. 4-Digit Pin A unique 4 Digit pin will enable you to make quick payments at checkout counters, as well as whenever you proceed with any transaction. Billers Pay utility and phone bills by linking any savings/current bank account for convenient and hassle-free transactions. Coupons Pay less and enjoy more with Coupons. Purchase coupons easily via the app. Sinhala Geek Show by Chanux Bro.

title: How to sync HNB Fit with your fitness device or phone
description:
HNB FIT, Get Moving! Get Paid! 

Here's how you can sync your fitness device or phone with HNB FIT & start earning higher interest! Follow these steps and you are ready to go!

▪️ Step 1 - Download the HNB FIT App
▪️Step 2- Register your details 
▪️Step 3- Link your choice of the device with the App
▪️Step 4- Click start and you are set to go! 
▪️Step 5 - If your default goal is 6,000 steps which you can transfer up to Rs. 50,000 to earn higher interest 
▪️Step 6 - Once you've reached your goal, view your goal summary and transfer your accumulated amount to your HNB FIT Account 
▪️Step 7 - You can view your history of transactions from the transactions menu.

Download the HNB FIT App today!

#HNB #HNBFIT #Fitness

title: ඔබේ සිහින නිවස ඔබටම හිමි කර දෙන HNB නිවාස ණය!
description:
සෑම දවසකම ඔබ සිහින දකින, ඔබේ සිහින නිවස ඔබටම හිමි කර දෙන HNB නිවාස ණය! 
වසර 5ක් දක්වා පොලිය පමණක් ගෙවීමේ අවස්ථාව, ආදායම් සමඟ වාරික වැඩි කරගැනීමේ අවස්ථාව, අවසන් ගෙවීම ලෙස මුල් ණය මුදලෙන් 50%ක් ගෙවීමේ හැකියාව, වසර 25ක් පුරා ගෙවීම් කාලයක් සහ අඩුම පොලී අනුපාතය සමඟ, ඔබේම නිවසක් හිමිකර ගැනීමේ සතුට ඔබටත්!
ඔබට සතුට හිමි කර දීම අපේද සතුටයි!

වැඩි විස්තර සඳහා පිවිසෙන්න https://bit.ly/HNBHomeLoan 
ඔබේ ණය ඉල්ලුම් කරන්න : https://bit.ly/HNBHomeLoanApplication

#HNBHomeLoans #HNB #MakingYouHappyMakesUsHappy
